BasicInfo.short: Kidaptive is a media and technology company creating entertaining and adaptive content that help children learn.

Products.name: Leo's Pad
Products.description: Early education enrichment program for preschoolers

news.title: Kidaptive Closes $10.1 Million Round of Series B Funding Led by Formation 8, Menlo Ventures and Stanford-StartX Fund | Business Wire

Products.name: ALP - Adaptive Learning Platform
Products.description: Adaptive Learning platform is a big data/machine learning engine which creates a psychometric model of a learner, and enables connected game

Products.name: Learner Mosaic
Products.description: An award-winning product designed by early-learning experts to turn daily interactions with your child into meaningful learning moments

Products.name: Hodoo
Products.description: A quest-based MMORPG with over 300 characters in a 3D virtual world designed to help elementary-aged children learn to speak English
